name: cave-mouth
description: Sunlight streams down from an opening high above, you are in the bottom of a narrow ravine.

features.name: cave-mouth-wooden-door
features.placement: A simple [wooden-door] is tucked into the rock wall. It looks like it's unlocked.
features.description: The door is made of a dark brown wood with a polished iron handle.

action.move_msg: You open the door and step through.

features.name: cave-mouth-trapdoor
features.placement: A thin outline in the stone floor reveals a [trapdoor] below your feet.
features.description: It almost completely blends into its surroundings, but you notice a crack you could use to pry it open.

action.move_msg: You enter the trapdoor and climb down the ladder below.
action.locked_msg: Your fingers aren't able to pry it open, maybe there's a tool you can use.
action.unlock_msg: You slide the crowbar into the side of the trapdoor and pry it open.
action.unlock_placement: There is an open [trapdoor] beneath you, leading into a dark hole.
action.unlock_description: It's made of a thick heavy stone, you can just barely make out a ladder descending into the darkness below.

items.name: small-key
items.description: It's a small iron key on a short length of string.
items.placement: A [small-key] is hanging on the wall.

name: store-room
description: You are in a small store room dimly lit by a lantern.

features.name: store-room-wooden-door
features.description: The door is made of a dark brown wood with a polished iron handle.
features.placement: There is a simple [wooden-door] on one wall.

action.move_msg: You open the door and step through.

items.name: crowbar
items.description: It's a little bit rusty but seems sturdy enough.
items.placement: An old [crowbar] is leaning against the wall.
